sentences.en: He acknowledged that Mr Taylor's colour and ethnic origins were utterly irrelevant in the circumstances.
sentences.cn: 他承认在这种情况下泰勒先生的肤色和种族出身完全无关紧要。

sentences.en: Her statement is irrelevant to this case.
sentences.cn: 她的陈述与这件事无关.

sentences.en: It reminds me of something totally irrelevant to the film.
sentences.cn: 从这影片的名字,我想到和影片毫无关系的另外的事.

sentences.en: It was Swank's judgment that he had become irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 斯旺克的评价是,此人已无足轻重了.

sentences.en: Ludicrously irrelevant thoughts swarmed in her head.
sentences.cn: 一些毫无干系的荒唐想法在她的脑海里涌动.

sentences.en: Magdalena considered the past an irrelevant encumbrance.
sentences.cn: 玛格达莱娜把过去看作毫不相干的累赘。

sentences.en: Please concentrate on the business at hand and don't drag in irrelevant issues.
sentences.cn: 请你集中谈这件事,不要牵扯其他问题.

sentences.en: Students viewed Latin as boring and irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 学生认为拉丁语无聊且无关紧要。

sentences.en: That is completely irrelevant to the subject under discussion.
sentences.cn: 这跟讨论的主题完全不相关.

sentences.en: That is irrelevant; we must keep the main purpose of this meeting in sight.
sentences.cn: 那毫不相干, 我们要牢牢记住这次会议的主要目的.

sentences.en: The choice of subject matter is irrelevant.
The man proved to be deaf as well as dim - witted, for his mumbled answers were quite irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 那老僧既聋且昏,又齿落舌钝,所答非所问.

sentences.en: Their old hard-won skills were irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 他们以往辛苦学得的技能没什么大用处。

sentences.en: This involved the deletion of a great deal of irrelevant material.
sentences.cn: 这包括删除很大一部分不相关的内容。

sentences.en: We’re focussing too much on irrelevant details.
sentences.cn: 我们过于关注不相干的细节。

sentences.en: What you said is irrelevant to the subject.
When you write, avoid sandwiching the bad news between an irrelevant, indirect, or overly cushioned beginning and end.
sentences.cn: 在写文章时，不要把坏消息夹在毫不相关、拐弯抹角或过度铺垫的开头和结尾中间。

words.tran_cn: 不相干地，不切题地；不合适地
离题；枝节问题；不相关的事物
离题；无关之事物；不合时宜

trans.tran_cn: 不相干的，不恰当，缺乏时代性的，落后于潮流的，牛头不对马嘴
trans.tran_en: not useful or not relating to a particular situation, and therefore not important
